用户接口¶

注册新用户¶

POST /account/register/¶

注册新用户, account可以是手机号或邮箱,自动识别主册帐户

请求参数:

Parameters:
  • account (string) – 注册帐户
  • password (string) – 密码
  • rpt_password (string) – 确认密码
  • valid_code (string) – 4位数字验证码

请求示例

POST /account/register/ HTTP/1.1
Host: api.fitahol.com
Accept: application/json, application/x-www-form-urlencoded

{
    "account": "18600432852",
    "password": "123212312",
    "rpt_password": "123212312",
    "valid_code": "1236"
}

返回状态码:

Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – 注册成功
  • 400 Bad Request – 参数缺失或错误

请求成功返回:

HTTP/1.1 201 OK
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

{
"detail": "注册成功",
}

错误返回:

  • 密码不相同:
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

{
"detail": "密码不相同",
}
  • 验证码不符
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

{
"detail": "验证码不符,请重新输入",
}

用户登录¶

POST /account/login/¶

用户登录, account可以是手机号或邮箱,自动识别主册帐户

请求参数:

Parameters:
  • account (string) – 用户帐户
  • password (string) – 密码

请求示例

POST /account/login/ HTTP/1.1
Host: api.fitahol.com
Accept: application/json, application/x-www-form-urlencoded

{
    "account": "18600432852",
    "password": "123212312",
}

返回状态码:

Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – 请求成功
  • 400 Bad Request – 参数缺失或错误

请求成功返回:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

{
"gender": "0",
"id": 9,
"detail": "登录成功",
"age": "0",
"weight": "0",
"portrait": "",
"date_joined": "2016-06-14 17:09:50",
"height": "0",
"nickname": "18600432852",
"token": "6fab6f6a67ba10ddda5fc976154a33752695d413"
}

错误返回:

  • 用户名或密码错误:
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

{
"detail": "用户名或密码错误",
}

微信小程序登录¶

POST /wechat/wx/¶

小程序登录，进入获取 code和用户信息后调用

请求参数:

Parameters:
  • account (string) – 用户帐户
  • password (string) – 密码

请求示例

POST /account/login/ HTTP/1.1
Host: api.fitahol.com
Accept: application/json, application/x-www-form-urlencoded

{
    "nickName":"vividma",
    "gender":2,
    "language":"zh_CN",
    "city":"Chaoyang",
    "province":"Beijing",
    "country":"CN",
    "avatarUrl":"http://wx.qlogo.cn/mmopen/vi_32/Q0j4TwGTfTIjTP6X5nGOexhIYTSUaZh3MeeN6bKQveclgQsqc8EFX4nQBFrsxgqCOyBlAIsx5XaNJKibt7zkKiag/0",
    "code":"021tRNQQ07bJQa2mCLQQ0VMLQQ0tRNQ7",
    "u_type":1
}

返回状态码:

Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – 请求成功
  • 400 Bad Request – 参数缺失或错误

请求成功返回:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

教练端返回：

{
    "token":"443098a5da938a5408ecf891e6de27e453994636",
    "user_id":10052,
    "gym":null,
    "id":53,
    "u_type":1,
    "expert_tags":[],
    "user":
        {
            "id":10052,
            "nickname":"vividma",
            "portrait":"http://wx.qlogo.cn/mmopen/vi_32/Q0j4TwGTfTIjTP6X5nGOexhIYTSUaZh3MeeN6bKQveclgQsqc8EFX4nQBFrsxgqCOyBlAIsx5XaNJKibt7zkKiag/0",
            "user_id":10052,
            "intro":"undefined 北京"
        }
}

学员端返回：

{
    "token":"b9d3230ec331fc248054c267e3a58af4e3aca274",
    "u_type":0,
    "user_id":10053,
    "coach":
        {
            "id":50,
            "gym":null,
            "expert_tags":[],
            "user":{"id":10049,"nickname":"Fitahol","portrait":"http://wx.qlogo.cn/mmopen/vi_32/4612iaEeX1TtEyzruUPDX5DDTetPCKeOIvibvpAbIXxsqu1O5n52a1gannVywj4T7gUUobaCLD3s7aia2nJZSFLZQ/0","user_id":10049,"intro":""}
        }
}

错误返回:

  • 服务异常时会出现

重置密码¶

POST /account/reset_pwd/¶

用户重置密码, account可以是手机号或邮箱, 需要先发送验证码

请求参数:

Parameters:
  • account (string) – 用户帐户
  • password (string) – 密码
  • valid_code (string) – 验证码

请求示例

POST /account/reset_pwd/ HTTP/1.1
Host: api.fitahol.com
Accept: application/json, application/x-www-form-urlencoded

{
    "account": "18600432852",
    "password": "123212312",
    "valid_code": "1232",
}

返回状态码:

Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – 请求成功
  • 400 Bad Request – 参数缺失或错误

请求成功返回:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

{
"detail": "重置成功",
}

错误返回:

  • 验证码错误:
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

{
"detail": "验证码错误",
}
  • 用户帐户不存在
HTTP/1.1 404 NOT FOUND
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

{
"detail": "用户帐户不存在",
}

个人中心¶

POST /account/(user_id)/¶

获取用户个人相关信息, 集成个人信息 帐户信息等

请求参数:

无, 需要 Token 认证通过

请求示例

POST /account/3/ HTTP/1.1
Host: api.fitahol.com
Accept: application/json, application/x-www-form-urlencoded

返回状态码:

Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – 请求成功
  • 401 Unauthorized – 用户未登陆
  • 403 Forbidden – 用户权限不足

请求成功返回:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

**教练返回**
{
"unread_count": 4,
"user":{
    "date_joined": "2016-05-04 10:35:29",
    "id": 8,
    "nickname": "18600153507",
    "portrait": "",
    "gender": "0",
    "age": "0",
    "height": "0",
    "weight": "0"
},
"coach":{
    "gym":{"id": 1, "name": "麦加健身", "score": 10, "address": "", "telephone": "",…},
    "expert_tags":[
    {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "减脂",
    "desc": "减脂圣经"
    },
    {
    "id": 2,
    "name": "增肌",
    "desc": "肌肉维度"
    }
    ],
    "intro": "教练李辉",
    "experience": 3  //资历年限
}
}

**学员返回**
{
"unread_count": 4,
"user":{
    "date_joined": "2016-06-14 17:09:50",
    "id": 9,
    "nickname": "18600432852",
    "portrait": "",
    "gender": "0",
    "age": "0",
    "height": "0",
    "weight": "0"
},
"member":{
    "fit_goal":[
        {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "减脂增肌",
        "measure": "Kg",
        "goal": 0,
        "is_public": false
        }
    ],
    "gym":{
        "id": 1,
        "name": "麦加健身",
        "score": 10,
        "address": "",
        "telephone": "",
        "lat": 0,
        "lng": 0,
        "city": null
    },
    "intro": "马德岭"
}
}

查找用户¶

GET /account/profile/?query=189324214324¶

查找用户，返回用户个人信息

请求参数:

需要 Token 认证通过

Parameters:
  • query (string) – 查询参数，支持手机号/UID/用户名

返回状态码:

Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – 请求成功
  • 401 Unauthorized – 用户未登陆
  • 403 Forbidden – 用户权限不足

请求成功返回:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

[
    {
    "date_joined": "2016-06-14 17:09:50",
    "id": 9,  // 用户ID
    "nickname": "18600432852",
    "portrait": "",
    "gender": "0",  // 0未知,1男性,2女性
    "age": "0",
    "height": "0",
    "weight": "0"
    }
]

获取用户基本信息¶

GET /account/profile/(user_id)/¶

获取用户基本用户信息

请求参数:

无, 需要 Token 认证通过

请求示例

GET /account/profile/3/ HTTP/1.1
Host: api.fitahol.com
Accept: application/json, application/x-www-form-urlencoded

返回状态码:

Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – 请求成功
  • 401 Unauthorized – 用户未登陆
  • 403 Forbidden – 用户权限不足

请求成功返回:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

{
"date_joined": "2016-06-14 17:09:50",
"id": 9,  // 用户ID
"nickname": "18600432852",
"portrait": "",
"gender": "0",  // 0未知,1男性,2女性
"age": "0",
"height": "0",
"weight": "0",
"intro": "个性签名"
}

更新用户信息¶

PATCH /account/profile/(user_id)/¶

更新用户基本信息, put 为全量更新, 支持使用 patch 传单项数据进行更新

请求参数:

需要 Token 认证通过

Parameters:
  • nickname (string) – 用户昵称
  • intro (string) – 个性签名／简介
  • weight (int) – 体重,单位kg
  • height (int) – 身高, 单位cm
  • age (int) – 年龄
  • gender (int) – 性别, 0未知,1男性,2女性
  • gym_id (int) – 健身房ID，如果不存在需要引导用户创建
  • expert_tags (string) – 擅长领域IDs，多个数据以,间隔：”1,23,12,34”

请求示例

PATCH /account/profile/3/ HTTP/1.1
Host: api.fitahol.com
Accept: application/json, application/x-www-form-urlencoded

{
    "nickname": "马德岭",
    "weight": 80,
    "height": 178,
    "age": 27,
    "gender": 0,
    "intro: "更新签名"
}

返回状态码:

Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – 请求成功
  • 401 Unauthorized – 用户未登陆
  • 403 Forbidden – 用户权限不足

请求成功返回:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

{
    "detail": "更新成功"
}

头像上传¶

POST /account/portrait/¶

用户头像文件上传

请求参数:

需要 Token 认证通过

portrait 头像文件名称, 需要前端压缩文件，网页端按 base64上传

type 文件类型

返回状态码:

Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – 请求成功
  • 401 Unauthorized – 用户未登陆
  • 403 Forbidden – 用户权限不足

请求成功返回:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

{
    "detail": "上传成功"
}

学员列表¶

GET /account/member/¶

获取学员列表

请求参数:

需要 Token 认证通过

返回状态码:

Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – 请求成功
  • 401 Unauthorized – 用户未登陆
  • 403 Forbidden – 用户权限不足

请求成功返回:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

[
    {
    "user_id": 9,
    "nickname": "18600432852",
    "gender": "0",
    "portrait": ""
    }
]

学员ID/名称列表¶

GET /account/member/card/¶

学员ID/名称列表, 用在课程选择显示所有学员名称处。 同时返回头像地址

请求参数:

需要 Token 认证通过

Parameters:
  • query (string) – 查询参数，支持手机号/UID/用户名

返回状态码:

Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – 请求成功
  • 401 Unauthorized – 用户未登陆
  • 403 Forbidden – 用户权限不足

请求成功返回:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

[
    {
    "user_id": 10008,
    "nickname": "小助手",
    "portrait": "头像地址"
    }
]

查询教练学员¶

GET /account/member/?query=189324214324¶

查询学员，仅包括查询教练自己的学员； 建议本查询使用本地缓存，避免使用接口

请求参数:

需要 Token 认证通过

Parameters:
  • query (string) – 查询参数，支持手机号/UID/用户名

返回状态码:

Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – 请求成功
  • 401 Unauthorized – 用户未登陆
  • 403 Forbidden – 用户权限不足

请求成功返回:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

[
    {
    "user_id": 9,
    "nickname": "18600432852",
    "gender": "0",
    "portrait": ""
    }
]

学员详情¶

GET /account/member/(user_id)/¶

更新用户基本信息

请求参数:

需要 Token 认证通过

返回状态码:

Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – 请求成功
  • 401 Unauthorized – 用户未登陆
  • 403 Forbidden – 用户权限不足

请求成功返回:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

{
    "fit_goal":[
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "减脂增肌",
            "measure": "Kg",
            "goal": 0,
            "is_public": false
        }
    ],
    "user":{
        date_joined": "2016-06-14 17:09:50",
        "id": 9,
        "nickname": "18600432852",
        "portrait": "",
        "gender": "0",
        "age": "0",
        "height": "0",
        "weight": "0"
    },
    "gym":{
        "id": 1,
        "name": "麦加健身",
        "score": 10,
        "address": "",
        "telephone": "",
        "lat": 0,
        "lng": 0,
        "city": null
    },
    "intro": "马德岭"

个人私教列表¶

GET /account/coach/personal/¶

获取学员私人教练

请求参数:

需要 Token 认证通过

返回状态码:

Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – 请求成功
  • 401 Unauthorized – 用户未登陆
  • 403 Forbidden – 用户权限不足

请求成功返回:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

[
    {
        "gym": null,
        "expert_tags":[
            {"id": 3, "name": "增肌塑体", "desc": "增肌塑体", "is_public": true…},
            {"id": 4, "name": "减脂塑型", "desc": "减脂塑型", "is_public": true…}
            ],
        "user":{
            "id": 10008,
            "nickname": "小助手",
            "portrait": "http://www.fitahol.com/media/account/portrait/fitahol-icon.jpg"
            }
    },
    {
        "gym": null,
        "expert_tags":[
            {"id": 3, "name": "增肌塑体", "desc": "增肌塑体", "is_public": true…},
            {"id": 4, "name": "减脂塑型", "desc": "减脂塑型", "is_public": true…}
            ],
        "user":{
            "id": 10037,
            "nickname": "随便写",
            "portrait": "http://www.fitahol.com/media/icon/fitness-boy.png"
        }
    }
]

返回参数:

Parameters:
  • gym (string) – 所在健身房
  • expert_tags (list) – 擅长领域
  • user (json) – 个人信息

学员/教练请求列表¶

GET /account/relation/¶

学员/教练请求列表, 数据分页; 同微信新的朋友界面

请求参数:

需要 Token 认证通过

返回状态码:

Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – 请求成功
  • 401 Unauthorized – 用户未登陆
  • 403 Forbidden – 用户权限不足

请求示例

GET /account/relation/ HTTP/1.1
Host: api.fitahol.com
Accept: application/json, application/x-www-form-urlencoded

请求成功返回:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

{
"count": 8,
"next": null,
"previous": null,
"results":[
    {
    "id": 1,
    "sender":{"id": 8, "nickname": "18600153507", "portrait": ""},
    "recipient":{"id": 3, "nickname": "lingnck@163", "portrait": ""},
    "ref_type": "add_member",
    "status": 0,
    "ctime": "2016-06-16 15:43:20"
    },
    {"id": 2, "sender":{"id": 8, "nickname": "18600153507", "portrait": ""…},
]
}

返回参数:

Parameters:
  • ref_type (string) – 添加类型 (“add_member”, “添加学员”), (“add_coach”, “添加教练”), (“add_friend”, “添加好友”),(“add_follow”, “添加关注”)
  • status (int) – 接受状态 (1, “接受”), (-1, “拒绝”), (0, “等待回应”),
  • ctime (string) – 请求时间
  • sender (json) – 发送人信息
  • sender – 接收方信息

请求添加学员/教练¶

POST /account/relation/¶

添加新学员

请求参数:

需要 Token 认证通过

user_id 对应的添加 用户id； 系统自动识别用户身份添加关系

请求示例

POST /account/relation/ HTTP/1.1
Host: api.fitahol.com
Accept: application/json, application/x-www-form-urlencoded

{
    "user_id": 9
}

返回状态码:

Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – 请求成功
  • 401 Unauthorized – 用户未登陆
  • 403 Forbidden – 用户权限不足

请求成功返回:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

{
"detail": "添加成功,请等待对方验证",
}

确认添加学员/教练¶

POST /account/relation/<relation_id>/¶

确认添加新学员或教练; 添加请求会以通知方式发给对方, 在通知中点击查看是否确认添加

请求参数:

需要 Token 认证通过

status 接受状态, 拒绝为-1, 接受为1

返回状态码:

Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – 请求成功
  • 401 Unauthorized – 用户未登陆
  • 403 Forbidden – 用户权限不足

请求成功返回:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

拒绝对方:

    {
    "detail": "已拒绝对方请求",
    }

确认添加:

    {
    "detail": "确认成功",
    }

删除教练与学员关联¶

POST /account/del/relation/¶

删除学员与教练关联

请求参数:

需要 Token 认证通过

需要上传对应的 删除人员【学员／教练】 user_id

请求示例

POST /account/del/relation/ HTTP/1.1
Host: api.fitahol.com
Accept: application/json, application/x-www-form-urlencoded

{"user_id": 10008}

返回状态码:

Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – 请求成功
  • 401 Unauthorized – 用户未登陆
  • 403 Forbidden – 用户权限不足

请求成功返回:

{“detail”: “删除成功”}

最近几张照片形象¶

GET /account/figure/latest/¶

获取照片

请求参数:

需要 Token 认证通过

Parameters:
  • user_id (int) – 学员用户id

请求示例

GET /account/figure/?user_id=6 HTTP/1.1
Host: api.fitahol.com
Accept: application/json, application/x-www-form-urlencoded

返回状态码:

Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – 请求成功
  • 401 Unauthorized – 用户未登陆
  • 403 Forbidden – 用户权限不足

请求成功返回:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

[
    {
    "id": 1,
    "figure": "http://0.0.0.0:9999/media/account/figure/s25505835.jpg",
    "desc": "i try",
    "ctime": "2016-01-30 15:09:07",
    "user_id": 6
    }
]

返回参数:

Parameters:
  • figure (string) – 照片地址
  • desc (string) – 描述

照片形象¶

GET /account/figure/¶

获取照片

请求参数:

需要 Token 认证通过

Parameters:
  • user_id (int) – 学员用户id

请求示例

GET /account/figure/?user_id=6 HTTP/1.1
Host: api.fitahol.com
Accept: application/json, application/x-www-form-urlencoded

返回状态码:

Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – 请求成功
  • 401 Unauthorized – 用户未登陆
  • 403 Forbidden – 用户权限不足

请求成功返回:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

{
"count": 1,
"next": null,
"previous": null,
"results":[
    {
    "id": 1,
    "figure": "http://0.0.0.0:9999/media/account/figure/s25505835.jpg",
    "desc": "i try",
    "ctime": "2016-01-30 15:09:07",
    "user_id": 6
    }
]
}

返回参数:

Parameters:
  • figure (string) – 照片地址
  • desc (string) – 描述

添加照片形象¶

POST /account/figure/¶

添加照片形象

请求参数:

需要 Token 认证通过； figure和 figure_file 可选，一种是base64压缩数据，一种文件本身

Parameters:
  • user_id (int) – 学员用户id
  • figure (string) – 形象照片, 文件上传需要压缩传为base64数据
  • figure_file (file) – 形象照片, 可直接上传文件，需要 multipart/form-data支持
  • cdate (string) – 日期选择
  • desc (string) – 描述

请求示例

POST /account/figure/ HTTP/1.1
Host: api.fitahol.com
Accept: multipart/form-data

返回状态码:

Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – 请求成功
  • 401 Unauthorized – 用户未登陆
  • 403 Forbidden – 用户权限不足

请求成功返回:

{ “id”: 2, “figure”: “http://0.0.0.0:9999/media/account/figure/s25505835_uoR8YlH.jpg”, “desc”: “描述”, “utime”: “2016-01-30 15:19:33”, “user_id”: 6 }

删除照片形象¶

DELETE /account/figure/<figure_id>/¶

创建照片形象

请求参数:

需要 Token 认证通过

Parameters:
  • user_id (int) – 学员用户id

请求示例

DELETE /account/figure/1/?user_id=6 HTTP/1.1
Host: api.fitahol.com
Accept: application/json, application/x-www-form-urlencoded

返回状态码:

Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – 请求成功
  • 401 Unauthorized – 用户未登陆
  • 403 Forbidden – 用户权限不足

请求成功返回: :statuscode 204: 删除成功, 无内容
